net.co.java.packets

Class MessagePacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.packets.MessagePacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketWrapper

    public class MessagePacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacketWrapper
    This packet is used to send messages to other players and to instruct the client on what errors to display on login. The server uses this packet by routing it to it's destination (the other player).
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Thomas Gmelig Meyling

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  MessagePacket.MessageType
      An enumeration of various Message Types for the MessagePackets
